extends Object
    The Public Suffix rule.

    See Also:
    Donations

        The exception token. An exception rule begins with "!".

        The wildcard label.

      • DEFAULT

        public static final Rule DEFAULT
        The default rule ("*"). This rule applies if no other rule did match.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rule

        public Rule(String pattern)
        Initializes a normal rule. The pattern has no more exception token!
        Parameters:
        pattern - the rule matching pattern, not null

      • Rule

        public Rule(String pattern,
    boolean exceptionRule)
        Initializes a rule. The pattern has no more exception token!
        Parameters:
        pattern - the rule matching pattern, not null
        exceptionRule - whether this is an exception rule

    • Method Detail

      • getLabelCount

        public int getLabelCount()
        Returns the label count of this rule. The label count is used for determining the prevailing rule.
        Returns:
        the label count
        See Also:
        RuleComparator, Index.findRule(String)

      • getPattern

        public String getPattern()
        Returns the rule pattern. The exception token is not included in the pattern!
        Returns:
        the rule pattern, not null.

      • isExceptionRule

        public boolean isExceptionRule()
        Returns if this rule is an exception rule. Exception rules are always prevailing rules.
        Returns:
        true if this is an exception rule

      • match

        public String match(String domain)
        Returns the matched public suffix of a domain.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain name, may be null
        Returns:
        the public suffix for the domain name, or null if no match
